resource: 1001991.description=Rebate offered by Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A., Inc. Rebate will be applied on lease contracts, first toward the amounts due at lease signing or delivery, with any remainder to the capitalized cost reduction. One rebate per lease transaction. Rebate available on contracts executed through January 3, 2011. Only available on select new untitled Toyota models â€” Camry (excludes Hybrid model), Corolla, Matrix, RAV4, Tacoma and Yaris vehicles. College Graduate Program is subject to change or termination at any time. Some restrictions apply. Program may not be available in all states. On approved credit through your participating Toyota dealer and Toyota Financial Services. Not all applicants will qualify. 1001991.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001991.vtc=true 1001991.derived=false
